So the leaders are dead? That's good news, . Although from what you're telling me we'll have to step up our efforts against Dakanius.

Our agents spying on his camp haven't reported unusual activity, so maybe Dakanius doesn't know they're dead yet.

That said, I still haven't heard from two of my scouts, Kamia and Kantusa. It might be nothing, but if you could check in with them, , it would be a big help."Consider it done."

Okay, listen up. If you go north from here, you'll find a crossroads. Take the path leading west and you'll come to the devan hideout. That's where you'll find Kamia and Kantusa...disguised as devas.

Good luck.
<PCNAME> helped Kamia disrupt a ritual, then joined her in the search for Kantusa.

You killed the Assault Leaders? Well done!

That would definitely explain why the devas are gathering around vortex shards for a ritual. They must be trying to increase Dakanius's power for the coming attack on Crescentia!"What can we do to stop it?"

We need to destroy at least one of the vortex shards. They're the source of Dakanius's power.

I was waiting for Kantusa to arrive, but she's overdue...and the ritual is happening right now! Think you can do it?"I'll handle it."

Good work, .

Dakanius is going to be out for blood now. We need to get out of here before he finds us.

But we need to get Kantusa before we go."Okay. Where do you think she is?"

If Kantusa wasn't able to get away earlier, she's probably inside Dakanius's compound. I'll go get her while you clear us a path through the devan brigands.

Just move fast, and kill anyone who spots you. I'll locate Kantusa and meet you by the compound.

Are you ready?"Yes. Let's do this!"

I can't find Kantusa anywhere!

She's not dead, or these devan scum would all be talking about it."We'll have to look for her."
